channel.title: What do i add into my client folder for upload
channel.description: Ok my question is what do i put into the folder im gonna upload my client on? I know you just put the .class files of the - theme.jar applet subs and gui and client ones, but what do i do with the others? like - drawingarea, node files, rsapplet rs frame, rsimageproducer do i put those in or no?

item.title: What do i add into my client folder for upload
item.dc:creator: @karl1 karl`
item.description:
@karl1 wrote:

^^just .rar your client folder

Read full topic
item.source: What do i add into my client folder for upload

item.title: What do i add into my client folder for upload
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

If you mean upload to like, uppit, and stuff like that, you got to .zip, or .rar it so it can be uploaded, or .jar/.exe.

Read full topic
item.source: What do i add into my client folder for upload
